event.title: Meeting of the Berlin group in Berlin, Deutschland

body.p: The Berlin group of FSFE meets every 2nd Thursday of the month at Kieztreff Undine (Hagenstra√üe 57, a 5-minute walk from the Lichtenberg underground station) from 6 to 8 pm.

In addition to current topics on software freedom, the Januar meeting will mainly be about planning the activities of the group in 2026. I love FS, End-of-10, Di.Day, Umweltfestival, Software Freedom Day ... bring your ideas to the meeting.
All those interested in Free Software are welcome to come to the meeting. Accessible access to the Kieztreff is possible via the courtyard.
